title: Lab Rats
description:
A group of former runaways taken in by a government agency called The Campus are testing a military training system, the "Game Space." Ideally, "Game Space" would have linked troops into a virtual reality that exposed them to any combat scenario imaginable - that is, until the first set of trainees died. The Lab Rats have discovered that the virtual reality ties in to the user's subconscious as well as to the mainframe to get information, with disastrous and fatal results. Now it's all they can do to stay alive long enough to escape the system.

Written and illustrated by John Byrne and published by DC Comics.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
